title: Regarding the captain gangplank skin
body: He was disabled the whole time on OCE, how do we get the skin? Do we just play a game on him before the event is gone? Or what

replies.body: I hope so, I played him during the event, have yet to get the skin, not sure if the skin is given at the end of the event or whatever, Riot has not clarified this and I would like to see a red on this, thanks.
